lead_paragraph: Ryan Callahan scored twice and Steven Stamkos had a goal and an assist to propel the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 4-2 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on Sunday night for their third straight win.

headline.print_headline: Callahan, Stamkos Power Lightning Past Hurricanes 4-2
headline.main: Callahan, Stamkos Power Lightning Past Hurricanes 4-2

snippet: Ryan Callahan scored twice and Steven Stamkos had a goal and an assist to propel the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 4-2 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on Sunday night for their third straight win....
